StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetUserOrgName]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@UserID varchar(30), @OrgName varchar(45) OUTPUT AS
SELECT @OrgName = NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION INNER JOIN USER_LIST ON USER_LIST.MCC_CODE = RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.MCC_CODE WHERE USER_LIST.USER_ID = @UserID
